title: The marketplace of creative arts, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, conference
content:
BUILDING BRIDGES THROUGH BUSINESS  
   
The 6th World Islamic Economic Forum will be held at the Kuala Lumpur Convention Centre from 18-20th May 2010. Secure your place  now at the key event for captains of Industry, business entities and  emerging entrepreneurs of the Muslim world.

For further info, please contact:

Izran Al Amin  
Project Coordinator  
World Islamic Economic Forum Foundation  
2nd Floor, Kompleks Antarabangsa  
Jalan Sultan Ismail  
50250 Kuala Lumpur  
   
Tel: +603 2145 5500  
Fax: +603 2145 5504  
   
 [www.wief.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818123049/http:/www.wief.org/ "www.wief.org")

or

William Harald-Wong  
e-mail: william@whwdesign.com  
mobile: (6)019-3814687
